features.name: Shopping Cart System
features.description: State management for coffee orders, including add, remove, and quantity updates using React Context.

features.name: Menu Display
features.description: Renders a list of coffee items with prices, descriptions, and interactive 'add to cart' buttons.

features.name: Animated UI Components
features.description: Smooth 3D-like floating images and entry animations for menu items using Framer Motion.

features.name: Responsive Navigation
features.description: Navigation bar and mobile floating menu for easy access to sections of the site.

features.name: Order Process
features.description: Flow to confirm order details and proceed to WhatsApp for finalization.

features.name: Location Map
features.description: Interactive map showing Domcy Coffee store location using Leaflet.
